title: Flix: Movies and TV When You Want
description: Flix. Look up what streaming services have desired movies and TV shows.  Also save favorites.  Group project with Tressa Park and Bikram Shankhar.

title: Group Project: My Pantry
description: My Pantry. App for finding recipes based on ingredients the user already has. Group project with Jules Lazar and Mohmed Vaid.

title: Group Project: Flyte!
description: Flyte! Stock news and price app. Group project with Alex Bailon, Bikram Shankhar, Zaki Khan and Kyle Resurreccion.

title: Eat Da Burger!
description: Eat Da Burger! App that tracks burgers the user has eaten and wants to try.

title: Budget Tracker
description: Budget Tracker.  App that allows user to input and save transactions whether or not Internet service is available.

title: Note Taker
description: Note Taker.  App that allows user to create and delete notes.

title: Team Roster
description: TeamRoster.  Creates and displays current information about a work team.  App generates HTML in Node. Click on Link to App to see demonstration video.
